name: StickyBots
description: This frantic platform shooter is all about momentum, transformation and sticking to the ceiling. Test your metal with online competition and a complete single player campaign. Launch your fist and swap characters mid fight in this first of its kind platformer!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 1.90GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400 DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.00GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 275 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
